channel.title: keep doing – Openjdk
channel.description: Recent content in Openjdk on keep doing

item.title: ubuntu18.04-install-openjdk8
item.description:
添加 openjdk8 的第三方源

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:openjdk-r/ppa ppa (Personal Package Achives)

执行更新

apt-get update

安装 openjdk8

sudo apt-get install openjdk-8-jdk

选择版本

sudo update-alternatives - -config java

确认安装成功

java -version
